data.description:
The only player on Meta Quest that supports MVC 3D decoding (Blu-ray 3D), delivering a more seamless 4X clarity viewing experience for movies and VR videos.

Key Features include:

-	The only player on Meta Quest that supports MVC 3D decoding for Blu-ray 3D ISO, SSIF, mkv, m2ts, ts, mts, etc.

-	Seamless USB storage support for FAT32 / exFAT / NTFS with faster, smoother access. Superior capability recognizes all USB devices, for 4TB+, even 40TB, 4XVR is the only choice.

-	Exclusive 4X Display Technology for unparalleled detail and vibrancy.

-	4X Link feature for easy file transfer from PC to VR headset.

-	Robust network playback support via DLNA, SMB, FTP, SFTP, WebDAV, and WebDAVS.

-	The only player on the Meta Quest that supports Apple Spatial Video (MV-HEVC) captured on iPhone 15 Pro, no transcoding needed.

-	Intelligent and accurate recognition of video types (flat, 180° , 360° ), stereoscopic modes (2D, FSBS 3D, HSBS 3D, FOU 3D, HOU 3D).

-	HDR video support, exclusive HDR Luminance feature, more accurate picture color.

-	Smooth and powerful UI.

-	Immersive, realistic theatres.

Join Our Discord for more updates:  https://discord.gg/KMKtFECcd2

changelog.change_log:
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed some known bugs.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed some known bugs.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed some known bugs.

Bug Fixes:	
- Fixed occasional seeking issue in ssif.smap Blu-ray 3D ISO playback.
- Fixed other known bugs.
		
Improvements:		
- Optimized USB OTG and fixed read failure issue in certain cases.	
- Optimized subtitle display and fixed some bugs.

New Features:
- Added DLNA Casting from mobile devices to 4XVR on your VR headset.
- Added 4X Link feature.
- Added batch change video types in the video list.
- Added support for Alpha channel video in YUVA444P12LE and YUVA422P12LE formats, and further improvements in upcoming versions.

- Fixed occasional seeking issue in ssif.smap Blu-ray 3D ISO playback.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed some known bugs.

Improvements:
- Optimized the logic of In-App Purchase (IAP), ensuring seamless offline playback experience without the worry of switching back to the trial version.
- Optimized intelligent recognition of video types.

New Features:
- Supported Hand Tracking feature.
- Supported ssif.smap format Blu-ray 3D ISO files; however, we still recommend using standard ssif format Blu-ray 3D ISO files for network playback.
